Edre Package¶

Api Object¶

class edre.Api(silent=False)¶

Main class

Parameters:silent – Whether to print out debug text
debug(*args, **kwargs)¶

Debug prints statements according to the Api.silent flag

get_info()¶

Gets info about the currently logged-in user, and saves the user’s courses to a list of course.Course objects.

get_thread_from_id(thread_id)¶

Returns an object inheriting from thread.Thread (thread.Post, thread.Question or thread.Announcement) from a thread ID.

Parameters:thread_id – Thread ID to get
key()¶

Return the access token in use

login(username='', password='')¶

Logs into Ed and obtains and saves an API key into a .session_key file.

If there is already a .session_key file (from a past run), it will be read, and the validity of the session key inside will be tested. If it is invalid, it will log in and generate a new one.

If the username or password parameter is not provided, you will be prompted for input.

Parameters:
  • username – Username to log in with
  • password – Password to log in with

Object Types¶

User¶

Course¶

class edre.course.Course(d)¶

Object representing a course.

Parameters:d – Dict representing a course.
get_thread_overviews(limit=20, sort='date', order='desc')¶
post(title, text, thread_type='p', category='General', subcategory='', pinned=False, private=False, anon=False)¶

Create a post in the course.

Parameters:
  • title – Title of the thread
  • text – Content of the thread
  • thread_type –

    Type of the thread:

    • p: post
    • q: question
    • a: announcement
  • category – Category of the thread
  • subcategory – Subcategory of the thread
  • pinned – Whether to pin the post
  • private – Whether the post is visible to staff only
  • anon – Whether the post is anonymous

Thread¶

class edre.thread.Thread(d, overview=False)¶

Superclass for dealing with threads.

Parameters:d – Dict representing the thread
comment(text)¶

Adds a comment to this post.

like()¶

Upvotes this post.

read()¶

Sends a read receipt for this post.

star()¶

Stars this post.

unlike()¶

Unvotes this post.

unstar()¶

Unstars this post.

view()¶

Increments this post’s view counter.

Comment¶

class edre.comment.Comment(d)¶

Class for defining comment objects.

Parameters:d – Dict representing a comment.
like()¶

Upvotes this comment.

reply(text)¶

Replies to this comment.

unlike()¶

Unvotes this comment.
